Preserving the past: PA American Water funds restoration of historic rail water tower on Knox & Kane Rail Trail Photo by Matt Benson Nov 5, 2025 Nov 5, 2025 Updated 10 hrs ago Comments Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save The historic Russell City water tower, located on the Knox & Kane Rail Trail, is scheduled for roof restoration by the TAMED association in the upcoming spring.
